What it is formulated to do:This fast-absorbing moisturizer hydrates the skin while providing antiaging and blemish fighting properties. It includes the latest in scientific research and advanced technology, including age-fighting antioxidants and the unique Hydra-Pure Chelating Complex®. Developed after years of observation and research, Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare created this complex to remove the heavy metals contained in water applied to the skinimpurities that can cause your own oils to form waxy plugs that lead to blemishes. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens What else you need to know:Although a moisturizer, this product's chelating properties can clear up acne or blemishes that have not responded previously to medication prescribed by a doctor. This product is ideal for all skin types, including oily, combination, and acne-prone skin. It is vegan, cruelty-free, dermatologist-approved, and it is free of fragrance and oil.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens - Phthalates What else you need to know:Olivier Baussan, founder of L'OCCITANE, discovered the benefits of shea butter during a trip to Burkina Faso in the 80’s. He was amazed to learn that women from Burkina Faso traditionally massage shea butter on newborns to protect them against harsh environmental elements (the sun, wind, etc.) and to soothe irritations. It absorbs quickly and thoroughly because its molecular weight is an almost identical match for skin. Crushed 23-karat gold flakes leave a subtle gleam on skin, and Infused licorice extract gently calms and helps to reduce visible redness. Hadasei-3 Complex, Tatcha’s proprietary trio of Japanese anti-aging superfoodsgreen tea, rice, and algaevisibly restores healthy-looking, youthful radiance.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: For 2,000 years, camellia oil has been treasured by geisha and Japanese women because of how it nourishes skin, leaving it glowing but never oily. They learned of its incredible benefits from Ama, Japanese female free divers who spend four hours a day, every day harvesting treasures from the sea wearing only a loin cloth. To protect their skin and hair from the salty, cold ocean water, they coat their skin with camellia oil. This beauty secret has been advanced for the lips by the Tatcha Institute in Japan with the Gold Camellia Beauty Oil.This product is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA. Beauty that gives back: Your purchase of a full-sized Tatcha skincare item will fund a day of school for incredible girls through thier Beautiful Faces, Beautiful Futures partnership with Room to Read.

name: Golden Krocus Ageless Saffron Elixir Serum
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:A precious golden elixir infused with the immense antioxidant power of one-day fresh Greek saffron to universally correct all visible signs of aging. Solutions for:- Fine lines/wrinkles- Uneven skin tone and discoloration - Loss of firmness/elasticity If you want to know more…In the Greek town of Kozani, lush krocus flowers bloom only once per year and produce the highest quality organic saffron in the worlda potent spice more precious than gold. Korres extracts the full power of this hand-picked, one-day fresh saffron at its maximum antioxidant levels and combines it with beta-glucans, peptides, and amino acids to create this elixir that strengthens skin’s resistance to daily damage. A complex of amino acids, polysaccharides, and copper supports natural collagen production to help visibly firm and lift skin while reducing the appearance of wrinkles. Low molecular weight hyaluronic acid easily and deeply penetrates the skin to smooth, plump, and brighten. Much more than your typical serum, this universal and powerful booster repairs all visible signs of aging for all skin types and concerns. Experience a few golden drops every day for youthful-looking, glowing skin. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates What else you need to know:It takes 70,000 krocus flowerswhich bloom only once per year for two weeksto produce just one pound of Greek saffron. Each flower is hand-picked and the three delicate red saffron stigmas are hand-separated to preserve the potent antioxidant properties of this rare and precious spice. The unused parts of the flowers are returned to soil as organic fertilizer for the following year’s harvest, making this a zero waste, sustainable operation. The elixir is 94.9 percent natural and like all Korres formulations, it is made without petrolatum, mineral oil, silicones, propylene glycol, and ethanolamines. Research results:In a 2-week consumer use test: - 97% reported improved skin suppleness, elasticity, and overall health - 94% reported improved skin firmness - 91% reported improved performance of their existing skin care routine - 91% reported lifted skin - 91% reported even skin tone and texture In a 4-week consumer use test: - 91% reported that all signs of aging were minimized

detail_text: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily ✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:A quick-absorbing, medicated dry oil to clear congested pores, treat and prevent acne, and smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for clearer, smoother skin. By infusing salicylic acid into clarifying oils (like tea tree oil and black cumin seed oil), the drying effects of salicylic acid are nipped in the bud, while all of the treatment aspects (like clearing congested pores and managing blackheads and blemishes) are in full-force. Solutions for:- Dullness and uneven texture- Fine lines and wrinkles- Uneven skin tone If you want to know more…This innovative mask is like an at-home facial, containing a pro-quality AHA/BHA blend that effectively yet gently resurfaces skin and exfoliates the pore lining. Babyfacial™ will dramatically smooth texture, minimize the look of fine lines and wrinkles, refine pores, and boost overall clarity and radiance. Power-packed with a potent, soothing antioxidant complex, plus chickpea flour for incredible brightening, this next-generation mask reveals a youthful, glowing, and baby-soft complexion. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates What else you need to know:A 3 mL/ 0.1 oz Virgin Marula™ Luxury Facial Oil is included with this purchase. Babyfacial was created with every skin type in mind. Glycolic acids get a bad rap for being sensitizing, but the pH level and accompanying ingredients (think fragrant oils or high amounts of alcohol) can be the real problem. Babyfacial has the ideal pH level of 3.5 to 3.6 with a blend of acids that work together synergistically to ensure higher efficacy, while helping to avoid redness and irritation. This product is noncomedogenic and vegan. Drunk Elephant only use clean, non-toxic ingredients that either directly benefit the skin’s health or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulations. They never take into account an ingredient’s synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on its safety and bio-compatibility. You won’t find silicones, chemical screens, sensitizing colorants, perfumes, or fragrant essential oils of any kind in their products, making them appropriate for every skin type. This is Drunk Elephant’s commitment to you. As supporters of IEF (International Elephant Foundation), this product is cruelty-free and formulated without gluten.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Phthalates What else you need to know: In 1981, Olivier Baussan, founder of L'Occitane, traveled to Burkina Faso where the local women relied on shea butter and its exceptional moisturizing properties to help nourish their skin. He began working with 12 women in a cooperative to produce shea butter for L'Occitane products. More than 30 years later, L'Occitane works with more than 15,000 women in fair trade cooperatives and supports their economic emancipation with literacy and microcredit programs.

name: Argan Reserve™ Healthy Skin Treatment Concentrate
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for? ✔ Normal ✔ Oily ✔ Combination ✔ Dry ✔ Sensitive What it is: A radiance-boosting, line-smoothing argan treatment concentrate that is 11-times stronger than argan oil alone. Like a supercharged superfood for your skin, this limited-edition treatment concentrate nurtures and enhances skin clarity, texture, hydration, and resiliency for the smoothest, healthiest skin of your life. Argan Leaves brighten and tone with nutrient-rich flavonoids, argan press cake balances and protects with soothing saponins, and argan oil nourishes and smooths with essential fatty acids. Pore size is visibly reduced and fine lines and wrinkles appear plumped up to supple perfection. Skin is healthier, happier, and ready to face the beauty of age and time with youthful energy. What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens - Sulfates - Phthalates What else you need to know: Argan Reserve is created in harmony with nature and utilizes only what mother nature naturally provides. The precious argan tree only grows in the southwest desserts of morocco on UNESCO protected woodlands. It is crucial to the health and sustainability of the argan tree that both the leaves and the nut are never picked from the tree. This limited quantity reserve is a result of the leaves yielded from the yearly harvest. It is pure, precious, sustainable, and rooted in the natural beauty and power of mother nature. Each bottle is hand signed and hand numbered, representing the unique, precious, and pure power of this limited-quantity, skin-transforming healthy argan concentrate. Research results: In a clinical study: - 100% of users showed a significant improvement in skin smoothness and pore size appearance after 72 hours - 100% of users showed a significant improvement of crow's feet, laugh lines, forehead wrinkles, and neck fine lines and wrinkles after 2 weeks - 100% of users showed an average increase of 135% in skin moisture after 4 weeks In a consumer study, after 4 weeks: - 100% of users agreed skin brightness, clarity, and elasticity was visibly improved te, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Amorphophallus Konjac Root Powder.

name: C.E.O. C + E antiOXIDANT Protect + Repair Moisturizer
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:A hydrating moisturizer that infuses skin with high-potency, advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate) to fight the first visible signs of aging while providing powerful antioxidant support. Solutions for:- Fine lines and wrinkles- Dryness If you want to know more…C.E.O. C + E Protect and Repair Moisturizer infuses five percent advanced, oxygen-stable tetrahexydecyl ascorbate (THD ascorbate) into the skinthe gold standard form of vitamin C. THD ascorbate is the newer, clinically-proven, oil-soluble derivative of vitamin C, which penetrates better into the skin while being exceptionally stable against oxygenation. With 5 percent THD ascorbate, this moisturizer is powerful at fighting the first visible signs of aging and restoring vital skin radiance, while being uniquely suitable for those with sensitive skin, as THD ascorbate is significantly less irritating than other forms of vitamin C. Once in the skin, it helps boost youthful-looking skin texture and volume, in addition to providing photostable, antioxidant support. Blended with protective, anti-pollution expopolysaccharides and refining lime pearl extract, this formula visibly repairs the effects of aging, environmental stress, and pollution-induced damage. It is rich yet never greasy, providing hydration and antioxidant protection to the skin for a visibly younger, softer, and healthier-looking complexion. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates What else you need to know:THD ascorbate (tetrahexyldecyl ascorbate) is the superior form of vitamin C. It is more stable and less irritating than ascorbic acid and other vitamin C derivatives.

This antioxidant-rich treatment does not contain propylene glycol.

name: Crème Ancienne®
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for? ✔ Normal ✔ Oily ✔ Combination ✔ Dry ✔ Sensitive What it is: A luxurious face treatment that smooths the appearance of wrinkles and provides ultimate nourishment with oils hand-blended in a monastery. Handmade in a monastery, this ultra-effective formula is proven to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in depth and length, providing a significant, anti-oxidative effect for 24 hoursdelivering instant and long-lasting hydration. The face cream is hand-blended with meadowfoam seed oil, a unique fatty acid absorbed by the skin to provide the ultimate nourishment. A dose of vitamin E provides antioxidant protection against wrinkle-causing free radicals, while chamomile wax decreases dry spots, softens the skin, and imparts a light moisture-preserving veil. What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens - Sulfates - Phthalates What else you need to know: "Inspired by the world's first cream, Crème Ancienne contains such fragile ingredients that each must be poured in a particular sequence at a specific dose at a determined temperature all in perfect balancerequirements that can only be met by hand. We turned to a monastery to hand-blend each jar because monks are an important part of the cream's heritage. Historically, if a formula was not produced by a monk, it was considered witchcraft. Without them, the original formula would not exist today."Lev Glazman and Alina Roytberg, Fresh Co-founders Research results: In-vivo test: - Proven to have a significant moisturizing effect for 28 hours - Proven to have a significant anti-oxidative effect for 24 hours - Proven to have an immediate smoothing effect on wrinkles - 97% felt it moisturized and prevented dry skin - 90% noticed a nourishing effect

name: Umbrian Clay Purifying Mask
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is: A triple-threat clay treatment that can be used as a mask to instantly purify skin, a daily deep cleanser, or a spot treatment to minimize imperfections.Solutions for:- Pores - Blemishes - OilinessIf you want to know more…Perfect for all skin types, Umbrian Clay is a gentle, three-in-one treatment that can also be used as a daily deep cleanser or to minimize imperfections. "Tucked away on the top of a hill in central Italy is a small gem of a town called Nocera Umbra. I traveled to this picturesque village almost 18 years ago to discover their hidden secretUmbrian clay, an ultra-fine, mineral-rich clay. This unique clay has been around for centuries and was even used by the ancient Etruscans for its array of benefits. I have been impressed with its versatility and high level of effectiveness ever since my first visit. This multitasking treatment features Umbrian clay, which I call a ‘miracle ingredient.’ I can’t live without this one-of-a-kind mask, which one can always find it in my cosmetic bag. It is one of my favorite treatments because of its versatility and how I can pair it with other products like Soy Face Cleanser and Rose Face Mask. Ideal for all skin types, this mask deeply cleanses, purifies, and significantly reduces the appearance of pores. I also use the formula as spot treatment to minimize small imperfections without drying the skin for a balanced, healthy-looking complexion."Lev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder Beauty tips: - Following a day of heavy makeup, use this gentle face mask after cleansing to purify the skin for a super clean, healthy feeling. - For a deep cleanse, start with Fresh Soy Face Cleanser to remove impurities and makeup. Rinse. Massage Umbrian Clay Purifying Mask onto face for 30 seconds, then remove with warm water. - To prep your skin before binge-masking or applying masks back-to-back, balance and purify your skin first with Umbrian Clay Purifying Mask. Apply the charcoal-toned face mask on cleansed skin and rinse off after three to five minutes before starting your multi-masking experience.
